message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you, even more so than my initial asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $9,000 is too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,000?
I'm still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to meet you at $9,500. That's the highest I can go.
